text: At sunset, a shepherd was about to lead the flock to the stable. Then he counted his sheep and, very alarmed, realized that one was missing. In anguish, he began to search for her for hours, until the night became very advanced. She couldn't find it and she started crying desperately. And a man came out of the tent, and passed by, and looked upon him, and said to him, Behold, why do thou carry a sheep upon thy shoulders? FIN
title: El pastor distraído
author: nan Anónimo
